keywordReminderTexts.reminder: During your turn, you can spend all my movement to move anywhere along my diagonal.
During your turn, you can use a space of movement and give me -XE to move me through X Ethereal characters.
When I die, annihilate me. During your turn, you can pip revive me for half cost.
When I'm hand-discarded, choose another discarded Crazy Idea. Pay a pip and play it.
When this character dies (while I'm equipped), rehand me.
When turns start, move an adjacent character 1 space, then I attack them.
When friendly turns start while there's a friendly Sportsball augment, discard-cast me.
While I’m inactive, I can’t attack or move.
When turns start, deck-cast a different Weather adjacent to me. Regardless, annihilate me.
A character is martyred when they die during an enemy turn.
When I'm cast, set my C to 0. When friendly turns start, give me +1 C.
When I'm summoned, move me 1 space. When turns start, move me 1 space.
Mill until you mill a character with S < my S. Revive them.
